sentences.sContent: ...the U.S. Plenipotentiary to the UN conference.
sentences.sCn: ...美国在联合国大会的全权代表。

words.tran: 充分地；完全地；有全权地

trans.tranOther: An ambassador plenipotentiary or minister plenipotentiary has full power or authority to represent their country
someone who has full power to take action or make decisions, especially as a representative of their government in a foreign country
